Title: Relates to the redistricting commission and incarcerated individuals
Summary: Provides that in drawing districts, prison populations shall be subtracted from the places of incarceration and incarcerated individuals shall be re-allocated, where possible, to such incarcerated individual's permanent home address; makes related provisions.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 4 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to the redistricting commission and incarcerated individuals
